Body: Possible Duplicate:  What's the most effortless way for “cloud” back up of photos taken with an Android phone?  Is there a way to automatically sync photos taken on my phone to picasa web albums? In the Gallery I can see albums from the web synced to my phone but not the other way round.
Title: Is there a way to automatically sync photos taken on my phone to picasa web albums?

history.Text: Is there a way to automatically sync photos taken on my phone to picasa web albums? In the Gallery I can see albums from the web synced to my phone but not the other way round.
Is there a way to automatically sync photos taken on my phone to picasa web albums?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [What's the most effortless way for “cloud” back up of photos taken with an Android phone?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/2172/whats-the-most-effortless-way-for-cloud-back-up-of-photos-taken-with-an-androi)  Is there a way to automatically sync photos taken on my phone to picasa web albums? In the Gallery I can see albums from the web synced to my phone but not the other way round.
